title: Minimal and Uncluttered Package Documentation
text: can install development version postdoc r-universe:
code: # Download and install postdoc in R install.packages('postdoc',    repos = c('https://ropensci.r-universe.dev','https://cloud.r-project.org'))

title: Generate HTML reference manual — render_package_manual
text: Renders complete package reference manual HTML format.

title: Generate HTML reference manual — render_package_manual
code: render_package_manual(package, outdir = ".", link_cb = r_universe_link)  render_base_manuals(outdir = ".")  r_universe_link(package)

title: Generate HTML reference manual — render_package_manual
text: package name package outdir put html file link_cb callback function can used customize hyperlinks packages. function gets invoked help file contains links another package, return URL html reference manual package. Set NULL drop cross-package links.

title: Generate HTML reference manual — render_package_manual
text: Math rendering syntax highlighting done server-side R JavaScript libraries needed browser, makes documents portable fast load.
